transit_routes.name: Ship Tenders
transit_routes.note: Many South Pacific ports require tendering (small boats to shore). Weather dependent.

transit_routes.name: Lagoon Tours
transit_routes.note: Best way to experience the lagoons. Snorkeling with rays and sharks included.

featured_experiences.name: Bora Bora Lagoon Tour
featured_experiences.note: Must-do in Bora Bora. Tender to Vaitape, then lagoon tour boat. Book ahead.

featured_experiences.name: Moorea Belvedere Lookout
featured_experiences.note: Dramatic scenery. 4WD tours popular. Less crowded than Bora Bora.
